cast.name: 马特·马格努森 Matt Magnusson

this_title: Masquerade, a Story of the Old South
introduction: 1848年，弗吉尼亚州。奴隶夫妇山姆和妮妮在奴隶主乔治无理取闹后，实施了一次逃跑。受真实故事启发，《假面舞会，旧南方的故事》是一部不寻常的奴隶叙事，捕捉了非裔美国人和同性恋者在这个复杂时代的经历。1848 Virginia. Slave couple Sam and Ninny execute an escape after their slave master George makes an unconscionable advance. Inspired by a true story, "Masquerade, A Story of the Old South" is an uncommon slave narrative, capturing the experience of both African Americans and gay people during this complicated time.@爱看电影的浩浩
chinese_title: Masquerade, a Story of the Old South
